column1: Belba Baggins was a Hobbits of the Shire.

column3: of Mungo Baggins and Laura Grubb. This made her the aunt of Bilbo Baggins. She married Rudigar Bolger
column4: and they had one child together

column1: :Five portraits are clustered on a wall in Bag End. One of them is Belba
column2: and one of Bilbos lines when looking at the portraits is "Thats my Aunt Belba".
